page.title: 20Credits & Acknowledgements
page.content: This survey has been compiled by members of Upton Grey Womens Institute with help from husbands and friends. The authors are :- Religion: Mr.R.Burton Ecology: Judge Ewart James Science and Technology: Mr.R.Barrett of Carless Exploration Ltd Transport: Mrs.Heather Perry Population: Mrs.Margaret Byars Recreation,Energy ) Attitudes ) Col.Cyril Wright Biography,Local History, Preface and Communications: Mr. Felix Bedford Life Style: Miss Nora Sclater Booth Farming,Forestry,Housing, Landscape and Buildings: Mrs. Juliet Chamberlain Home Life: Mrs Hall Editor: Juliet Chamberlain Computor Operator: Jack Chamberlain
